They can prescribe stronger antiperspirants and discuss more extreme options like surgery to remove sweat glands or shave your armpits. Shaving your armpits regularly can help reduce bacteria growth, and tobacco use can also contribute to body and underarm odor.

gt_summary: Cut the body and head from white cardstock. Cut paper for a collar. Fold the collar paper around the body. Create an edge on the primary chiyogami paper. Attach the body to the kimono. Fold the left corner over. Fold in the rest of the left side. Repeat with the right side. Cut a piece of paper for the obi. Fold the obi around the kimono. Cut a piece of paper for the obijime. Fold the obijime over the obi. Attach the head to the body. Create hair from black cardstock. Adhere the hair to the head. Step back and admire your work.
pred_summary: To make a Hina Matsuri doll, start by cutting out a small head and body from white or ivory cardstock. Next, fold a strip of chiyogami paper to create the collar of the doll and attach it to the body. Finally, use additional chiyogami paper to create the kimono and obi of the doll, and attach the obijime around the obi.

pred_summary: Laser eye surgery is a procedure that uses a beam of light to reshape the cornea and correct astigmatism. The surgery is considered safe and low risk, but there are some potential side effects such as dry eyes, double vision, glare, and vision loss.

pred_summary: To walk with a blind person, you should place the back of your hand on their hand to help them locate your arm, and they should hold your arm just above the elbow. When encountering narrow spaces, you should alert the blind person and have them step behind you, and you may need to switch sides when guiding a blind person.

gt_summary: Learn what soldering is. Use solder to bind things. Use a soldering iron to heat the solder. Use other equipment to assist in soldering. Turn on the lights. Prepare adequate ventilation. Don't solder for too long in one sitting.
pred_summary: Soldering is the process of melting a metal onto other metal components to bind them together. The purpose of soldering is to bind two other components together using a softer metal with a lower melting point than the other components. Soldering irons are used to melt the solder, and they come in various configurations, with heat controls for different projects and types of solder.
